Nightstrike/darkfate:

Nightstrike cursed while he tried to shot against th=
e base and avoided to be shot. Darkfate just remainted quiet and face down,=
 trying that nobody hit him
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: rm2kmid=
i 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, September 20, 2005 9:59 P=
M
  Subject: Re: A little girl lost/Pacificus Maximals


  "Thirty seconds =
until the shield is back up, then we can talk strategy." said Salveo

  He =
continued firing, wondering why there were only two minions here now.  The =
trooper with the granade launcher was now shooting a plain rifle from the w=
indow he was at.  The turrets continued fireing and so did Guardia. 

   
 =
 On 9/20/05, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote: 
    : : Rodimus =
Prime : :


    While still manualy controling the would-be auto gun, Rodim=
us starts to strafe his shots back and forth from Darkfate to Nightstrike.
=



    Airly <airly2002@...> wrote:
      Darkfate/Nightstrike:

  =
    Darkfate quickly Fell down and tried to cover himself while Nightstrike=
 flew away tried to got covered behind a rock 
        ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
        From: Richard Allen 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
=
        Sent: Saturday, September 17, 2005 6:31 PM
        Subject: Re: A l=
ittle girl lost/Pacificus Maximals

         
        : : Rodimus Prime : :=

        Rodimus watches as the enemy fire strikes the shields.

        Ro=
dimus Prime: Oh... I was hoping he could join the party. I brought a supris=
e for him!

        Rodimus continues to mock the Minions, hoping to break =
any concentraition they might have and give the Maximals an opening.

     =
   He then takes hold of one of the ships autoguns, aiming the heavy artill=
ery weapon directly at Darkfate's head as he opens rapid fire.
